p:
Epichlorohydrin (0.88 ml,11.2 mmol) was added dropwise to a stirred solution of N-hydroxy-5-norbornene-2,3-dicarboximide (2 g, 11.2 mmol) and Et 3N (3.12 ml, 22.4 mmol) in anhydrous DMF (8 ml). After stirring for 18 h at rt the reaction mixture was poured into water (50 ml) and extracted with CHCl 3 (2×50mL). The organic phases were combined, washed with water (2 × 100 ml), dried (Na 2SO 4) filtered and evaporated under reduced pressure. The crude epoxide 39 was purified by crystallisation with n-hexane. NMR data were in accordance with those reported in literature
25 .
